title: 8.1 Master Challenge 1
question: Urban traffic management systems and network routing share many similarities in terms of efficiency and redundancy. Draw parallels between a city's traffic system and network routing. How does the concept of redundancy play out in urban planning, and how is it similar or different from its role in network systems?
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
